cu.explanation_en: Setting the PDCP log level to an invalid value will cause the logging system to fail initialization and prevent the CU from starting properly.

du.explanation_en: Setting the PDCP log level to an invalid value will cause the logging system to fail initialization and prevent the DU from starting properly.
du.explanation_zh: 將 PDCP 日誌等級設定為無效值會導致日誌系統初始化失敗，並阻止 DU 正確啟動。
